channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Nested View Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Nested View Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34182|2024-08-03T08:16:17.200Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nested%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Nested View Plugin 1.20 through 1.25 (both inclusive) does not escape search parameters, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21680|2024-08-03T18:23:28.576Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nested%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Nested View Plugin 1.20 and earlier does not configure its XML transformer to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
